mapper.insert: INSERT INTO repellent_plan( factory_num, crowd_num, repellent_eartag, repellent_time, repellent_name, repellent_way, repellent_quality, operator, remark, is_pass1, is_pass2, gmt_create ) VALUES( #{repellentPlanModel.factoryNum}, #{repellentPlanModel.crowdNum}, #{repellentPlanModel.repellentEartag}, #{repellentPlanModel.repellentTime}, #{repellentPlanModel.repellentName}, #{repellentPlanModel.repellentWay}, #{repellentPlanModel.repellentQuality}, #{repellentPlanModel.operator}, #{repellentPlanModel.remark}, #{repellentPlanModel.isPass1}, #{repellentPlanModel.isPass2}, #{repellentPlanModel.gmtCreate} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM repellent_plan WHERE factory_num = #{factoryNum} AND repellent_time BETWEEN #{gmtCreate} AND #{gmtTrans}
SELECT * FROM repellent_plan WHERE factory_num = #{factoryNum} AND repellent_time = #{repellentTime} AND repellent_name = #{repellentName}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM repellent_plan WHERE factory_num = #{factoryNum} AND repellent_time = #{repellentTime}
